DOC.brief_summary: Background : Inactive individual face motivational obstacle become stay physically active . Therefore , sustainable physical activity promotion program tailor reach inactive individual need . Purpose : test effect ( long short-term ) feasibility train program evaluate association baseline motivation become physical activity change physical activity performance . Design : uncontrolled trail Setting/participants : inactive , female hospital staff age 45 old University Hospital Zurich Intervention : 3-month step-up jogging program Main outcome measure : physical performance level physical activity
DOC.brief_title: Active Over 45 : A Step-up Jogging Program Inactive Female Hospital Staff Aged 45+
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : female hospital stuff regular physical activity old 45 year Exclusion criterion : osteoporotic fracture last three month significant musculoskeletal , cardiac respiratory disorder
